t: r/Justrolledintotheshop on Reddit: Don’t buy stoptech
s: June 23, 2022 - Stoptech is just a brand name... it doesn't mean much. Stoptech parts are made by Centric Parts which is a subsidiary of First Brands Group who own all kinds of auto parts brands. Rule 1 of merchandising is that the brand label or whatever is on the box doesn't mean anything, its just marketing.
